languages.text: {n}В процессе заключения союза монахи и техножрецы обнаружили неожиданное сходство между собой — истово верующие и преданные своим святыням, обе стороны нашли в себе силы искать друг в друге истинных единомышленников, а не вынужденных союзников.{/n}

{n}In the process of forming their alliance, the monks and the Tech-Priests have discovered they have something in common — both groups hold strong convictions and are truly devoted to their relics, and thus the two sides are now endeavouring to see one another as true like-minded supporters, not mere reluctant allies.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В процессе заключения союза монахи и техножрецы обнаружили неожиданное сходство между собой — истово верующие и преданные своим святыням, обе стороны нашли в себе силы искать друг в друге истинных единомышленников, а не вынужденных союзников.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}In the process of forming their alliance, the monks and the Tech-Priests have discovered a surprising similarity between them — both of them had strong convictions and devotion to their relics, and thus both sides had found the strength to look for the true like-minded supporters,and not forced allies, within each other.{/n}

{n}In the process of forming their alliance, the monks and the Tech-Priests have discovered a surprising similarity between them — both of them had strong convictions and devotion to their relics, and thus both sides had found the strength to look for the true like-minded supporters,and not forced allies, within each other.{/n}

{n}In the process of forming their alliance, the monks and the Tech-Priests have discovered they have something in common — both groups hold strong convictions and are truly devoted to their relics, and thus the two sides are now endeavouring to see one another as true like-minded supporters, not mere reluctant allies.{/n}

{n}In the process of forming their alliance, the monks and the Tech-Priests have discovered a surprising similarity between them — both of them hold strong convictions and devotion to their relics, and thus both sides found the strength to see one another as true like-minded supporters, not mere reluctant allies.{/n}

{n}In the process of forming their alliance, the monks and the Tech-Priests have discovered a surprising similarity between them — both of them hold strong convictions and devotion to their relics, and thus both sides found the strength to see one another as true like-minded supporters, not mere reluctant allies.{/n}

{n}In the process of forming their alliance, the monks and the Tech-Priests have discovered they have something in common — both groups hold strong convictions and are truly devoted to their relics, and thus the two sides are now endeavouring to see one another as true like-minded supporters, not mere reluctant allies.{/n}

{n}In the process of forming their alliance, the monks and the Tech-Priests have discovered they have something in common — both groups hold strong convictions and are truly devoted to their relics, and thus the two sides are now endeavouring to see one another as true like-minded supporters, not mere reluctant allies.{/n}

{n}In the process of forming their alliance, the monks and the Tech-Priests have discovered they have something in common — both groups hold strong convictions and are truly devoted to their relics, and thus the two sides are now endeavouring to see one another as true like-minded supporters, not mere reluctant allies.{/n}

languages.text: {n}在结为同盟的过程中，修士与技术神甫意识到他们之间有许多相似之处。双方都怀着坚定的信念，都对圣物无比虔诚。在这样的共识之下，双方不再将对方视为勉强凑合的搭档，而是将彼此视为志同道合的伙伴。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In the process of forming their alliance, the monks and the Tech-Priests have discovered they have something in common — both groups hold strong convictions and are truly devoted to their relics, and thus the two sides are now endeavouring to see one another as true like-minded supporters, not mere reluctant allies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在结为同盟的过程中，修士与技术神甫意识到他们之间有许多相似之处。双方都怀着坚定的信念，都对圣物无比虔诚。在这样的共识之下，双方不再将对方视为勉强凑合的搭档，而是将彼此视为志同道合的伙伴。{/n}
{n}在结为同盟的过程中，修士与技术神甫找到了他们之间惊人的相似之处。双方都怀着坚定的信念，都对圣物无比忠诚。双方从中找到了力量，转而将彼此视为志同道合的支持者，而不是勉强凑合的盟友。{/n}

languages.text: {n}En el proceso de formación de su alianza, los monjes y los tecnosacerdotes descubrieron que tenían algo en común: ambos se mantienen fieles a sus convicciones y sienten devoción por sus reliquias. Así, ambas partes se esfuerzan ahora por considerarse auténticos aliados, más allá de sus obligaciones legales.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In the process of forming their alliance, the monks and the Tech-Priests have discovered they have something in common — both groups hold strong convictions and are truly devoted to their relics, and thus the two sides are now endeavouring to see one another as true like-minded supporters, not mere reluctant allies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En el proceso de formación de su alianza, los monjes y los tecnosacerdotes descubrieron que tenían algo en común: ambos se mantienen fieles a sus convicciones y sienten devoción por sus reliquias. Así, ambas partes se esfuerzan ahora por considerarse auténticos aliados, más allá de sus obligaciones legales.{/n}

languages.text: {n}同盟を結ぶ過程で、修道士と技術司祭の間で思いもかけないような共通点があることが分かった...両者とも強い信念と聖遺物に情熱を抱いているのだ。双方は、互いを気が進まない仲間ではなく、真の志を同じくする協力者と見なす力を得ることになった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In the process of forming their alliance, the monks and the Tech-Priests have discovered they have something in common — both groups hold strong convictions and are truly devoted to their relics, and thus the two sides are now endeavouring to see one another as true like-minded supporters, not mere reluctant allies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}同盟を結ぶ過程で、修道士と技術司祭の間で思いもかけないような共通点があることが分かった...両者とも強い信念と聖遺物に情熱を抱いているのだ。双方は、互いを気が進まない仲間ではなく、真の志を同じくする協力者と見なす力を得ることになった。{/n}
{n}同盟を結ぶ過程で、修道士と技術司祭の間で思いもかけないような共通点があることが分かった...両者とも強い信念と聖遺物に情熱を抱いているのだ。双方は、互いを気が進まない仲間ではなく、真の志を同じくする協力者と見なす力を得ることになった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Au moment d'entériner leur alliance, moines et technoprêtres se découvrent des points communs surprenants, à savoir des convictions inébranlables et une très grande dévotion envers leurs reliques. Les deux parties trouvent alors la force de se considérer non pas comme des alliés réticents, mais comme deux entités collaborant au service d'une même cause.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In the process of forming their alliance, the monks and the Tech-Priests have discovered they have something in common — both groups hold strong convictions and are truly devoted to their relics, and thus the two sides are now endeavouring to see one another as true like-minded supporters, not mere reluctant allies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Au moment d'entériner leur alliance, moines et technoprêtres se découvrent des points communs surprenants, à savoir des convictions inébranlables et une très grande dévotion envers leurs reliques. Les deux parties trouvent alors la force de se considérer non pas comme des alliés réticents, mais comme deux entités collaborant au service d'une même cause.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als sie ihre Allianz schmiedeten, erkannten die Mönche und Techpriester, dass sie etwas gemeinsam haben ... beide Gruppen pflegen starke Überzeugungen und widmen sich ihren Relikten mit großer Hingabe. Deshalb betrachten sich beide Seiten mittlerweile nicht nur als widerwillige Verbündete, sondern als geleichgesinnte Partner.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In the process of forming their alliance, the monks and the Tech-Priests have discovered they have something in common — both groups hold strong convictions and are truly devoted to their relics, and thus the two sides are now endeavouring to see one another as true like-minded supporters, not mere reluctant allies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Als sie ihre Allianz schmiedeten, erkannten die Mönche und Techpriester, dass sie etwas gemeinsam haben ... beide Gruppen pflegen starke Überzeugungen und widmen sich ihren Relikten mit großer Hingabe. Deshalb betrachten sich beide Seiten mittlerweile nicht nur als widerwillige Verbündete, sondern als geleichgesinnte Partner.{/n}

{n}Während sie ihr Bündnis aushandelten, bemerkten die Mönche und die Techpriester eine überraschende Ähnlichkeit zwischen ihren beiden Gruppen. Beide besitzen eine starke Überzeugung und Hingabe ihren Reliquien gegenüber, und daher konnten beide Seiten die Kraft in sich finden, die jeweils andere als echte, gleichgesinnte Unterstützer anzusehen, nicht nur bloß als widerwillige Verbündete.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Keşişler ve Tekno Rahipler, ittifak kurma sürecinde aralarında ortak bir nokta olduğunu keşfetti. Her iki grup da yadigârlarına karşı kuvvetli bir inanç ve bağlılık sergiliyordu. Bu nedenle her iki taraf da birbirlerini gönülsüzce edinilmiş müttefikler olarak değil, aynı düşüncedeki hakiki destekçiler olarak görmeye başladı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In the process of forming their alliance, the monks and the Tech-Priests have discovered they have something in common — both groups hold strong convictions and are truly devoted to their relics, and thus the two sides are now endeavouring to see one another as true like-minded supporters, not mere reluctant allies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Keşişler ve Tekno Rahipler, ittifak kurma sürecinde aralarında ortak bir nokta olduğunu keşfetti. Her iki grup da yadigârlarına karşı kuvvetli bir inanç ve bağlılık sergiliyordu. Bu nedenle her iki taraf da birbirlerini gönülsüzce edinilmiş müttefikler olarak değil, aynı düşüncedeki hakiki destekçiler olarak görmeye başladı.{/n}
